title: 关闭正版验证后台还显示要同意eula
author: 蓝天skyblue
txt_content:
RT，玩家进不去，后台报错
10.08 11:35:25 [服务器] 信息 加载Lib库，请稍等...
10.08 11:35:30 [服务器] 信息 开启Minecraft服务器版本: 1.11.2
10.08 11:35:30 [服务器] 信息 加载属性文件
10.08 11:35:30 [服务器] 信息 你需要同意eula才能运行服务器。查看eula.txt获得更多信息。10.08 11:35:30 [服务器] 信息 服务器关闭中
下面是我的配置

#Properties Config file
#Fri Aug 10 11:16:32 CST 2018
server-name=Unknown Server
generator-settings=
force-gamemode=true
allow-nether=true
gamemode=0
enable-query=true
player-idle-timeout=0

op-permission-level=4
announce-player-achievements=true
pvp=true
snooper-enabled=true
level-type=DEFAULT
hardcore=true
enable-command-block=true
max-players=50
network-compression-threshold=256
resource-pack-sha1=
max-world-size=29999984

debug=off
server-ip=0.0.0.0
spawn-npcs=true
allow-flight=true
level-name=world
view-distance=10
resource-pack=
spawn-animals=true
white-list=true
generate-structures=true
online-mode=false
max-build-height=256
level-seed=
use-native-transport=on
prevent-proxy-connections=off
motd=A Minecraft Server
enable-rcon=true
spawn-protection=16
spawn-mobs=on
rcon.password=5ClUf0497L
auto-save=on
texture-pack=
hellworld=true复制代码
下面是eula
#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).
#and also agreeing that tacos are tasty.
#Fri Aug 10 11:35:41 CST 2018
eula=false
复制代码

replies.author: skyinr
replies.txt_content:
emmmmm
#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).#and also agreeing that tacos are tasty.#Fri Aug 10 11:35:41 CST 2018eula=false

eula=true
